```{r}
#| include: false

qcolors <- function(...){
  
  qaad_palette <- c(
    lincoln = "#105622",
    eerie = "#171614",
    sapphire = "#0C556D",
    blue = "#0094C6",
    wintergreen = "#6B8F7E",
    gold = "#D1B817",
    bronze = "#D58936",
    space = "#37423D",
    kobe = "#942911"
  )
  
  choices <- unlist(list(...))
  
  if (length(choices) == 0) return(qaad_palette)
  
  unname(qaad_palette[choices])
  
} 
        
```
